## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G12420](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G12420)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>WSD7</u>
- **Gene Name:** WS /DGAT 7
- **Description:**   O-acyltransferase (WSD1-like) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:505006610
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
